item.title: Bibliography Management
item.description: What do the files mean? Here, I store all bibliography entries in article.bib , pdfs to pdfs folder, notes in articles.org file. That’s all there is to understand. (setq bibtex-completion-library-path "c:/Users/sagar/Dropbox/pdfs/" bibtex-completion-bibliography "c:/Users/sagar/Dropbox/org/references/articles.bib" bibtex-completion-notes-path "c:/Users/sagar/Dropbox/org/references/articles.org" bibtex-completion-notes-path "c:/Users/sagar/Dropbox/org/references/articles.org") (setq org-ref-notes-directory "c:/Users/sagar/Dropbox/org/notes/" org-ref-bibliography-notes "c:/Users/sagar/Dropbox/org/references/articles.org" org-ref-default-bibliography '("c:/Users/sagar/Dropbox/org/references/articles.bib") org-ref-pdf-directory "c:/Users/sagar/Dropbox/pdfs") Using these files Adding entries: Find a paper, add it to aricles.bib. Either DOI or paper link. If pdf found by org-ref, okay. Else doi-utils-get-bibtex-entry-pdf run it.
